      • endsIf

        public static void endsIf(boolean cond,
                          java.lang.String mess)
        Ends the program if the condition occurs.
        Parameters:
        cond - Condition to be evaluated. If occurs, displays a message and terminates the program.
        mess - Message to be displayed.

        Ends the program if the condition occurs.
        Parameters:
        obj - Object to be tested if is null. If occurs, displays a message and terminates the program.
